bibl.title: Territory of Washington vs. George Smith
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court for the Fourth Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: SUBPOENA Territory of Washington County of Spokane, To F.L. Graves, C.M. Graves, Charles D. Colwell In the name of the United States, you are hereby required to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justicesof the Peace in and for the said County, on the 2nd day of May 1888, at o'clock P.M. at his Office in Spokane Falls to give evidence in a certain cause then and there to be tried between Territory of Washington Plaintiff and John Doe Defendant on the part of the Territory. Given under my hand this 2nd day of May 1888. J.R. Snyder Justice of Peace

Territory of Washington County of Spokane Falls Herby certify that i received written subpoena on this 2nd day of June 1888 and served and sworn the written named person in the city of Spokane Falls signed this the 2nd day of June 1888 J.F. Warren Chief of Police Fees $120 m 20 $140
Territory of Washington vs John Doe SUBPOENA. Filed June 2nd 1888 J.R. Snyder Justice of Peace
